lead_paragraph: Inter Milan coach Roberto Mancini has been banned for one game after he was sent off, argued with match officials and made an insulting gesture during Sunday's 3-0 derby defeat by AC Milan.

headline.print_headline: Mancini Gets One-Match Ban After Milan Derby Flare Up
headline.main: Mancini Gets One-Match Ban After Milan Derby Flare Up

snippet: Inter Milan coach Roberto Mancini has been banned for one game after he was sent off, argued with match officials and made an insulting gesture during Sunday's 3-0 derby defeat by AC Milan....
